data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Intimation
data.news_body:
Intimation pursuant to Regulation 30(6) of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 for
interaction with Investors/Analysts.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Intimation
data.news_body:
In compliance with the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we hereby
inform that an Earnings Call is scheduled to be held on Thursday February 12 2026 at 03:00 P.M. IST to discuss the
unaudited financial results of the Company for the quarter and nine months ended December 31 2025 with the
investors.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Intimation
data.news_body:
Dear Sir/ Madam
In compliance with the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we hereby
inform that an Earnings Call is scheduled to be held on Thursday February 12 2026 at 03:00 P.M. IST to discuss the
unaudited financial results of the Company for the quarter and nine months ended December 31 2025 with the
investors. Details of the Earnings Call is enclosed herewith.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 and 33 read with Schedule III of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 as amended we would like to inform you that the Board of Directors of Shringar House of Mangalsutra Limited (the Company) at its meeting held today i.e. Wednesday
November 12 2025 has inter-alia considered and approved the Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone) for the quarter and half year ended September 30 2025 along with the Independent Auditors Limited Review Report thereon.
The said Financial Results were duly reviewed and recommended by the Audit Committee and approved by the Board of Directors of the Company at their respective meetings held today.

November 12 2025 Has Inter-Alia Considered And Approved The Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone) For The Quarter And Half Year Ended September 30 2025
data.news_body: Shringar House of Mangalsutra Limited at its Board Meeting held on November 12 2025 has interalia considered and approved the unaudited Financial Results (Standalone) for the quarter and half year ended September 30 2025

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for To Inter-Alia Consider And Approve The Unaudited Financial Results Of The Company For The Quarter And Half Year Ended September 30 2025.
data.news_body:
Shringar House Of Mangalsutra Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 12/11/2025 inter alia to consider and approve Pursuant to Regulation 29 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we wish to inform you that a meeting of the Board of Directors of Shringar House of Mangalsutra Limited (the Company) is scheduled to be held on Wednesday November 12 2025 to inter-alia consider and approve the Unaudited Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and half year ended September 30 2025.

In accordance with the SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations 2015 and in terms of the Companys Code of Conduct for Regulating Monitoring and Reporting of Trading by Insiders of the Company we have intimated about the closure of Trading Window vide our letter dated September 29 2025. The Trading Window shall continue to remain closed till 48 hours from the announcement of the financial results of the Company for the quarter and half year ended September 30 2025.

This intimation is also being uploaded on the Companys website at www.shringar.ms

data.news_body: The CIN of the Company has been changed from U36911MH2009PLC189306 to L36911MH2009PLC189306 and the listing status has been changed from "No" to "Yes"

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On Tuesday October 7 2025 - Financial Results Ref: Regulation 30 & 33 Of The SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 (Listing Regulations)
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 and 33 read with Schedule III of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 as amended we would like to inform you that the Board of Directors of Shringar House of Mangalsutra Limited (the Company) at its meeting held today i.e. Tuesday October 7 2025 has inter-alia considered and approved the Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone) for the quarter ended June 30 2025 along with the Independent Auditors Limited Review Report thereon.

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body: Trading Window of dealing in the securities of Shringar House of Mangalsutra Limited shall remain closed for all the designated persons of the Company and their immediate relatives with effect from Wednesday October 1 2025 till the expiry of 48 hours after declaration of Un-audited Financial Results for the quarter and half year ended September 30 2025

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for To Inter-Alia Consider And Approve The Unaudited Financial Results Of The Company For The Quarter Ended June 30 2025.
data.news_body:
Shringar House Of Mangalsutra Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 07/10/2025 inter alia to consider and approve Pursuant to Regulation 29 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we wish to inform you that a meeting of the Board of Directors of Shringar House of Mangalsutra Limited (the Company) is scheduled to be held on Tuesday October 7 2025 to inter-alia consider and approve the Unaudited Financial Results of the Company for the quarter ended June 30 2025.

 In accordance with the SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations 2015 and in terms of the Companys Code of Conduct for Regulating Monitoring and Reporting of Trading by Insiders of the Company we have intimated about the closure of Trading Window vide our letter dated September 17 2025. The Trading Window shall continue to remain closed till 48 hours from the announcement of the financial results of the Company for the quarter ended June 30 2025

data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Shringar House of Mangalsutra Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from September 17 2025 the equity shares of Shringar House of Mangalsutra Ltd (Scrip Code: 544512) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of B Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20250916- dated September 16 2025.
